Class.name: zCustom.CheckSNMP
Class.Description: Check that the SNMP service is running - it flakes out every time snmpd gets restarted (plus a lot of other times) Glen Pitt-Pladdy (InterSystems)

Method.name: Setup
Method.Description: Setup everything needed for reliabls SNMP monitoring
Method.Implementation: // enable %Service_Monitor set serv=##class(Security.Services).%OpenId("%service_monitor") set serv.Enabled=1 ;; enable do serv.%Save() // clear any old tasks set rs=##class(%ResultSet).%New() do rs.Prepare("SELECT ID FROM %SYS.Task WHERE TaskClass = 'zCustom.CheckSNMP'") do rs.Execute() while rs.Next() { set id = rs.Data("ID") if id'="" { w "Remove Existing ID="_id,! do ##class(%SYS.Task).%DeleteId(id) } } // setup the task set task=##class(%SYS.Task).%New() set task.Name="Check SNMP" set task.Description="Check and re-starts SNMP service to ensure always running" set task.TimePeriod=0 // daily set task.DailyFrequency = 1 // several times a day set task.DailyFrequencyTime = 0 set task.DailyIncrement = 15 // every 15 minutes set task.RunAsUser = "SuperUser" set task.TaskClass = "zCustom.CheckSNMP" set taskdef=##class(zCustom.CheckSNMP).%New() do task.AssignSettings(taskdef) do task.%Save() // kick off task do ##class(%SYS.Task).RunNow(##class(%SYS.Task).GUIDToID(task.JobGUID)) quit $$$OK

Method.name: OnTask
Method.Implementation: set rs=##class(%ResultSet).%New() do rs.Prepare("SELECT COUNT(*) AS running FROM %SYS.ProcessQuery WHERE Routine = 'SNMP'") do rs.Execute() do rs.Next() set status = rs.Data("running") //w "status = "_status,! if status = 0 do start^SNMP //w running,! quit $$$OK
